name: skidlocked (itch)
description:
A fast-paced racing game about biking through traffic.
Features:
  • a free-roaming city with traffic simulation
  • 6 different missions
  • high-scores
  • post-game with randomly generated races.

Settings: N to toggle minimap, M to toggle motion blur

Inspired by GTA, cycling through town, and Terry Barentsen's videos.

Current Sokpop Collection
